metadata.title: CVE-2022-21692 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: OnionShare is an open source tool that lets you securely and anonymouslyshare files, host websites, and chat with friends using the Tor network. Inaffected versions anyone with access to the chat environment can writemessages disguised as another chat participant.

criterions.comment: onionshare package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
